title: A guide to landscape painting with Del Newport
creator_credit: Leigh Kidd, Val Osborn, Robert Dunn and Coral Coast Video
brief_description: Del Newport, prominent teacher and exhibition artist with national and overseas recognition shows step by step the fine detail and intricacies of landscape painting. As she paints a landscape from memory, Del explains what she is doing and why.
